body: Ok.  It's all fixed. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/F4WLVH57ZQHxRmP48ueFiESbGYVHqmY7VpIjsrBFmXoFSWz2rqmGiCnYL15G3AXPev1YAweDXnjLrjWHeWvdg2ByL2SKqxwy/RadiationMan.PNG) You can find the fixed component in the attached GH file and on the github.  I deleted the last GH definition so that people don't download the buggy one by accident.  Let me know if you find any other issues. -Chris
